law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 21, effective July 1, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Tax credit for use of gasoline-alcohol blend -- Dealer's report -- Use of coal produced in United States -- Use of distilled spirits produced in Kentucky -- Refunds.
